snippet.title: Ice Lair Teaser Trailer - Walkabout Mini Golf
snippet.description:
Are you prepared to slide into Ice Lair? Carved into an arctic glacier lies a brutalist subterranean hideout cloaking an ice-cold plot against humanity. In this next installment of the Evil Lair series, your mission is to putt through the icy headquarters of a former scientist mastermind as you attempt to stop her colony of puffin henchmen intent on perfecting their freeze ray technology... Get ready for a heated challenge in this sinister arctic base this Thursday.

#gametrailers  #walkaboutminigolf   #gaming  #vr
